/* Input parameters for program EWDC (Production System 4).
   This file contains input parameters for the calculation of cost due to
   milking (when calculated EV for milking speed).
   Be careful when changing input parameters. Please notice that 
     the description of the given parameter or vector is posted under 
     the number(s).
   MU: monetary unit */
2.52
"Average milking speed (mspeed)"
"kg/min"
56.25
"Costs for milking labour (costml)"
"MU/hour"
16.90
"Costs for electrical power for milking (costme)"
"MU/hour"
0.502
"Costs for wear (depreciation) on the milking equipment (costmw)"
"MU/hour"
